name: Alpha Centauri (Topper)
description:
Test the cutting edge speed-of-light space travel on a thrilling journey to Alpha Centauri - in real time!

This is the most idle of idle games. No controls, just watch the stars fly by. Technically beatable... by keeping the page open for ~4.3 years.

Made for "GAMES MADE QUICK???". Although, actually, I'd made it before (in python) so this was more of an excuse to look into three.js if anything, so that's nice.

Update - you now get to return home again!
